DOC.brief_title: Microvascular Dilatation After Endogenous Induced Hyperinsulinemia
DOC.criteria: healthy normotensive subject : 1 . 1860 year 2 . Caucasian 3 . Blood pressure < 140/90 mmHg obese normotensive subject : 1 . 1860 year 2 . Caucasian 3 . Blood pressure < 140/90 mmHg 4 . BMI 3038kg/m2 hypertensive subject : 1 . 1860 year 2 . Caucasian 3 . Untreated hypertension > 140/90mmHg . Exclusion Criteria healthy normotensive hypertensive subject : 1 .
